ðŸ“– Summary: Bevy is a data-driven game engine built in Rust, designed for both 2D and 3D game development. It emphasizes simplicity, modularity, and performance, utilizing an Entity Component System (ECS) architecture. Bevy aims to provide a productive and enjoyable development experience with fast compile times.
